about_the_game:
A life of crime doesn’t stop for the Holidays! The Festive Felonies FREE Cosmetic Pack includes the following items to customize your Boss and HQ:

• Xmas Sweater
• Kwanzaa Sweater
• Hanukkah Sweater
• Xmas Twig
• Hanukkah Candle
• Dreidel
• Kwanzaa Candle
• Snowball emote
• Dreidel emote

content_descriptors.notes: Saints Row contatins frequent violence with blood effects and portrays the rise of a criminal gang in a realistic modern day America. Frequent cursing, crude humor and sexual innuendos are present throughout the dialogue. The character editor allows the player to be naked including censored genitalia and uncovered breasts.

short_description: A life of crime doesn’t stop for the Holidays! Sprinkle some seasonal cheer on your illegal activities with the Festive Felonies FREE Cosmetic Pack.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
